attributes.action: Stop fines for parents of children with mental health illness like depression
attributes.additional_details: If a teacher was ill with depression he or she would get the correct help and time away from there work to combat the illness student don't parents are fined for there children illness which leads to stressful times for the family schools don't consider mental health illness a proper illness in children but the reality is children are taking there own life's as they believe there's no where to turn as waiting lists are to long for councillors to help
attributes.background: Children  suffer daily with mental health illness like depression and anxiety which can stop them attending school regularly there is very little help from schools or doctors available students are forced to attend school by teachers even if they are having a bad day leading to the illness worsening
